What's Hyperliquid?

Hyperliquid is a decentralized exchanges (DEX) that provides a platform for trading various cryptocurrencies.
The platform is known for its:

  • Decentralized trading with non-custodial wallets
  • Wide range of supported cryptocurrencies
  • Advanced trading features

What can you trade with Hyperliquid?

With Hyperliquid, you can trade perpetual contracts through our platform.

Quantities for perpetual contracts are measured in base asset units.

Hedge Mode is not available; only One-Way Mode is supported.

API Key Setup Process

follow the steps below to configure your API Keys.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. Our platform uses industry-standard encryption to protect your credentials.' %}

1 Connect your wallet

  1. Go to Hyperliquid exchange by clicking on this link.
  2. Connect your wallet by clicking on the "Connect" button in the top-right corner.

2 Access API Management

  1. Click on tools from the navigation.
  2. Select "API" from the dropdown menu.

3 Generate API Key

  1. Type a name for your API key.
  2. Click on "Generate address" (This is not your wallet address).
  3. Click on "Authorize API wallet".
  4. Set the Days Valid to MAX.
    This private key will expire when it reaches its maximum validity period. make sure to renew it by following the same steps before expiration.
  5. Copy your Private Key to a secure location.
  6. Get your wallet address from your wallet provider or by clicking on the "Copy Address" icon.
  7. Use your wallet address and private key to connect your account to our platform.

Complete Integration

Once you have your API keys and wallet address, return to our platform's Automate section and use them to link your Hyperliquid account with our automation system. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
